Heroes.Description: - Added a new hero, {{HeroIcon|Shiv}} Shiv
- Improved visual clarity of {{HeroIcon|Grey Talon}} Grey Talon's trap armed state
- Fixed targeting previews that draw a model (like {{HeroIcon|McGinnis}} McGinnis's turrets) to update every frame, instead of being fixed at 60hz
- Remastered {{HeroIcon|Abrams}} Abrams, {{HeroIcon|Pocket}} Pocket, and {{HeroIcon|Dynamo}} Dynamo weapon fire sounds
- Improved {{HeroIcon|Wraith}} Wraith tracers to feel more connected to their bullet
- Updated {{HeroIcon|Infernus}} Infernus tracer, muzzle, and impact fx revisions for better performance
- Gun range reduced from 50m to 30m + 2.5m/boon (max of 58m)
- Speed while shooting increased from 55% to 70%
- Base regen increased from 2.5 to 3
- Base Bullet Resist increased from 0% to 10%
- Bullet Resist per boon reduced from 2.5% to 1.6% (same overall bullet resist at max)
- Fixed hooking through veils sometimes not working
- Health per boon increased from 37 to 42
- Base spirit resist increased from 8% to 15%
- Speed while shooting increased from 55% to 70%
- Base ammo reduced from 45 to 40
- Base Bullet Resist increased from -15% to 0%
- Base Spirit Resist reduced from 0% to -15%
- Fixed the camera moving too slowly after teleporting with Cloak
- Stunning or immobilizing {{HeroIcon|Viscous}} Viscous now stops the ball from moving, and prevents him from doing damage and stunning
- Base melee damage increased by 10%

Items.Description: - Fixed {{ItemIcon|Ricochet}} Ricochet sometimes shooting the extra bullet from your gun rather than the target
- Added a sound for movement being restricted by {{ItemIcon|Slowing Hex}} Slowing Hex and {{ItemIcon|Vindicta}} Vindicta tether
- Now grants +30% Bullet Resistance vs NPCs
- Fixed gaining stacks much faster than intended when taking damage from troopers
- Active Bullet Resist reduced from +60% to +40%
- Max Bullet Resist increased from 30% to 36%
- Time for Max Damage reduced from 3.5s to 3s (this is a buff)
- You permanently steal 1 stack (45 HP) from the enemy if they die under the debuff. If an enemy you stole a stack from kills you, they regain 1 stack back.
- No longer gives +2 ammo on kill
- Now gives +10% Weapon Damage per kill (up to +50%)
- When you die you lose a stack
- Heal effectiveness vs non-heroes increased from 25% to 35%
- Heal per stack increased from 30 to 40
- Weapon Damage While Shielded increased from +24% to +28%
- Spirit Power while Shielded increased from +17 to +20
- Air Jump/Dash Distance reduced from +50% to +40%
- Heal effectiveness vs non-heroes increased from 25% to 35%
- Heal increased from 45% of melee damage to +55%
- Out of combat regen timer reduced from 13s to 12s
- Debuff increased from -10% Spirit Resist to -12%
- Spirit Power Duration increased from 24s to 35s
- Damage Spirit Power scaling increased from 1.25 to 1.5
- Debuff no longer cancels active mobility spells, it only prevents them from being casted
- Now also reduces stamina distance by 30%
- Now applies -40% Fire Rate instead of a Disarm
- Infused ability bonus damage increased from +30 to +50
- Fire Rate reduction increased from -30% to -40%
- Non-Imbued ability cd reduction increased from 22% to 24%

- Added a new T4 Spirit item, {{ItemIcon|Magic Carpet}} Magic Carpet: Active - After a 1.3s delay, a magic carpet arrives to pick you up. You gain full flight controls and have +6 m/s movement speed. Lasts 7 seconds. If you cast abilities or use your gun, the carpet disappears. While on the {{ItemIcon|Magic Carpet}} Magic Carpet you gain +400 Bullet and +400 Spirit Shields. Passively grants +150 Health, +10% Ability Duration, and +15 Spirit Power. Cooldown: 40s

Abilities.Description: - Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Bebop}} Bebop's {{AbilityIcon|Sticky Bomb}} Sticky Bomb sometimes misfiring
- Fixed some cases where {{AbilityIcon|Lash}} Lash's {{AbilityIcon|Ground Strike}} Ground Strike would cause your hero to be stuck
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam T3 range not being calculated correctly when you have range increase items
- Holding M1 down while {{AbilityIcon|Flame Dash}} Flame Dash ends will now cause you to fire your gun instead of requiring you to let go and press again
- Improved {{AbilityIcon|Abrams}} Abrams Siphon and {{AbilityIcon|Seismic Impact}} Seismic Impact visuals to not obstruct player view as much
- Updated {{AbilityIcon|Haze}} Haze {{AbilityIcon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger cast, projectile loop and whizby
- Updated {{AbilityIcon|Haze}} Haze {{AbilityIcon|Smoke Bomb}} Smoke Bomb sound
- Removed {{AbilityIcon|Haze}} Haze {{AbilityIcon|Smoke Bomb}} Smoke Bomb voice line for everyone except the casting player and spectators
- Improved visibility of AOE around {{AbilityIcon|Bebop}} Bebop while casting {{AbilityIcon|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam
- Improved effects around {{AbilityIcon|Lady Geist}} Lady Geist {{AbilityIcon|Soul Exchange}} Soul Exchange to help with clarity
- Revised sounds for {{AbilityIcon|Pocket}} Pocket {{AbilityIcon|Flying Cloak}} Flying Cloak duration and warp
- Clarified {{AbilityIcon|Vindicta}} Vindicta {{AbilityIcon|Flight}} Flight T1 tooltip
- Weakened Patron now has a {{AbilityIcon|Torment {{AbilityIcon|Pulse}} Pulse}} Torment {{AbilityIcon|Pulse}} Pulse style effect, hitting up to 2 enemies in the pit for 75 damage per second
- Added {{AbilityIcon|Bounce Pad}} Bounce Pads in various areas of the map that launch you in a defined direction
- {{AbilityIcon|Bounce Pad}} Bounce Pad added to allow easier navigation from the Underground Shop to the upper courtyard. Replaces a juke spot.
- Added interior shaft with {{AbilityIcon|Bounce Pad}} Bounce Pad to an upper level balcony from defender side to face the Guardian
- Added a {{AbilityIcon|Bounce Pad}} Bounce Pad on the ground floor of the Police Station/Garment Building to the upper floor
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Seismic Impact}} Seismic Impact often not dragging enemies in the air along with you when you are slamming down
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Shoulder Charge}} Shoulder Charge not always placing enemies in front of you
- {{AbilityIcon|Seismic Impact}} Seismic Impact damage reduced from 175 to 150
- {{AbilityIcon|Hook}} Hook range reduced from 40m to 35m
- {{AbilityIcon|Hook}} Hook T2 increased from +25m to +30m
- {{AbilityIcon|Exploding Uppercut}} Exploding Uppercut now has a slight angle limitation to prevent straight-up direction
- {{AbilityIcon|Exploding Uppercut}} Exploding Uppercut radius increased from 10m to 14m
- {{AbilityIcon|Exploding Uppercut}} Exploding Uppercut T1 increased from -10s Cooldown to -11s
- {{AbilityIcon|Sticky Bomb}} Sticky Bomb radius increased from 10m to 12m
- {{AbilityIcon|Sticky Bomb}} Sticky Bomb can now be cast on self using alt cast hotkey
- {{AbilityIcon|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam T2 reduced from +140 to +100
- {{AbilityIcon|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam spirit scaling increased from 2.4 to 3.0
- {{AbilityIcon|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam turn rate improved by 10%
- {{AbilityIcon|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam nearby radius increased from 4.5m to 5m
- {{AbilityIcon|Hyper Beam}} Hyper Beam nearby damage now does 25% less than the full amount
- {{AbilityIcon|Rejuvenating Aurora}} Rejuvenating Aurora can now be canceled by using stamina instead of needing to manually exit first (pre T3)
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Kinetic {{AbilityIcon|Pulse}} Pulse}} Kinetic {{AbilityIcon|Pulse}} Pulse sometimes getting caught on stairs
- {{AbilityIcon|Singularity}} Singularity now has a 0.1s cast point
- {{AbilityIcon|Kinetic {{AbilityIcon|Pulse}} Pulse}} Kinetic {{AbilityIcon|Pulse}} Pulse width increased from 4.5m to 5m
- {{AbilityIcon|Kinetic {{AbilityIcon|Pulse}} Pulse}} Kinetic {{AbilityIcon|Pulse}} Pulse T3 increased from +115 Damage to +125
- {{AbilityIcon|Charged Shot}} Charged Shot collision radius reduced by 10%
- Fixed T3 {{AbilityIcon|Guided Owl}} Guided Owl not triggering correctly sometimes when the target has {{AbilityIcon|Spirit Armor}} Spirit Armor

- {{AbilityIcon|Sleep Dagger}} Sleep Dagger now puts you in a brief drowsy state for 0.25s seconds where you move slowly before falling asleep (you still have the ability to shoot/cast/move/etc during this period)
- {{AbilityIcon|Fixation}} Fixation T2 from +6s Duration to +5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Fixation}} Fixation T3 reduced from +0.25 to +0.2
- {{AbilityIcon|Bullet Dance}} Bullet Dance T1 increased from +6 to +7
- Fixed melee still going through when casting {{AbilityIcon|Stone Form}} Stone Form after initiating a melee attack
- {{AbilityIcon|Stone Form}} Stone Form T2 stun reduced from 0.75s to 0.5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Watcher's Covenant}} Watcher's Covenant T1 reduced from +15% Fire Rate to +10%

- Now has a new ultimate ability, {{AbilityIcon|Air Drop}} Air Drop. Take flight with an Ally (or self-cast to carry a bomb). You fly and drop the ally or bomb onto an area, dealing damage, slowing, and silencing enemies. {{AbilityIcon|Ivy}} Ivy and the ally gain a bullet shield when they are dropped. Allies can drop by themselves at any time. When using the ability without an ally (carrying a bomb), it has a 1 second cast time.
- {{AbilityIcon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam no longer applies a Disarm
- {{AbilityIcon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam now slows Fire Rate (same values as slow)
- {{AbilityIcon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam max slow reduced from 90% to 60%
- {{AbilityIcon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam time to reach max slow increased from 1.2s to 2s
- {{AbilityIcon|Frozen Shelter}} Frozen Shelter can now be cast while using {{AbilityIcon|Arctic Beam}} Arctic Beam
- {{AbilityIcon|Flog}} Flog cooldown reduced from 30s to 25s
- {{AbilityIcon|Flog}} Flog T3 now also reduces Fire Rate by 35%
- {{AbilityIcon|Mini Turret}} Mini Turrets now prioritize any heroes {{AbilityIcon|McGinnis}} McGinnis is shooting at
- {{AbilityIcon|Medicinal Specter}} Medicinal Specter duration Spirit Power scaling increased from 0.09 to 0.12
- {{AbilityIcon|Heavy {{AbilityIcon|Barrage}} Barrage}} Heavy {{AbilityIcon|Barrage}} Barrage T1 changed to Rockets apply 35% slow
- {{AbilityIcon|Scorn}} Scorn T3 now affects all damage types
- {{AbilityIcon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine projectile size reduced by 10%
- {{AbilityIcon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine cooldown increased from 24s to 28s
- {{AbilityIcon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine speed duration reduced from 4s to 3.5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine no longer affects channels, cast times or things like {{AbilityIcon|Lash}} Lash's {{AbilityIcon|Death Slam}} Death Slam
- {{AbilityIcon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine T1 reduced from +0.75s Max Stop duration to +0.5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Kinetic Carbine}} Kinetic Carbine T2 cd reduction increased from -8s to -10s
- {{AbilityIcon|Time Wall}} Time Wall T3 silence duration reduced from 3.5s to 3s
- {{AbilityIcon|Paradox}} {{AbilityIcon|Paradoxical Swap}} Paradoxical Swap projectile size reduced by 10%
- {{AbilityIcon|Barrage}} Barrage now respects line of sight
- {{AbilityIcon|Barrage}} Barrage amp effect now shows on {{AbilityIcon|Pocket}} Pocket
- {{AbilityIcon|Barrage}} Barrage Amp per stack reduced from 10% to 8%
- {{AbilityIcon|Barrage}} Barrage T3 changed to +5% Amp Per Stack
- Fixed multiple instances of {{AbilityIcon|Static Charge}} Static Charge not working correctly
- {{AbilityIcon|Lightning Ball}} Lightning Ball duration increased from 4s to 5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Static Charge}} Static Charge stun delay reduced from 4s to 3.5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Stake}} Stake base duration reduced from 2.5s to 2.25s
- {{AbilityIcon|Stake}} Stake T1 duration reduced from 1s to 0.75s
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Splatter}} Splatter direct hits counting as the second hit
- Fix Damage prevention after being hit by {{AbilityIcon|Viscous}} Viscous' {{AbilityIcon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball being reduced by {{AbilityIcon|Debuff Reducer}} Debuff Reducer
- {{AbilityIcon|The Cube}} The Cube cast range increased from 25m to 30m
- {{AbilityIcon|The Cube}} The Cube T2 cooldown reduced from -25s to -22s
- {{AbilityIcon|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch now deals light melee damage and is affected by melee items
- {{AbilityIcon|Puddle Punch}} Puddle Punch Charge Delay increased from 0.5s to 1.5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball duration reduced from 12s to 10s
- {{AbilityIcon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball T1 duration reduced from +6s to +5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball cooldown increased from 80s to 90s
- {{AbilityIcon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball now deals 50% damage to bosses
- {{AbilityIcon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball spirit resist reduced from 80% to 70%
- {{AbilityIcon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball bullet resist reduced from 70% to 60%
- {{AbilityIcon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball can now only stun and damage a target once every 1.5s, up from once every 1.0s
- {{AbilityIcon|Goo Ball}} Goo Ball acceleration lowered a bit
- {{AbilityIcon|Binding Word}} Binding Word no longer drains 1 stamina
- {{AbilityIcon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask cooldown reduced from 16s to 13s
- {{AbilityIcon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask T2 changed from -10s Cooldown to Drains 1 Stamina
- {{AbilityIcon|Alchemical Flask}} Alchemical Flask T3 now also reduces cooldown by -7s
- {{AbilityIcon|Binding Word}} Binding Word immobilize duration reduced from 2s to 1.75
- {{AbilityIcon|Binding Word}} Binding Word now has a quick cast behavior (same as {{AbilityIcon|Static Charge}} Static Charge)
- {{AbilityIcon|Card Trick}} Card Trick now has 0.5s cd per cast
- {{AbilityIcon|Telekinesis}} Telekinesis T2 duration reduced from +0.75s to +0.5s
- {{AbilityIcon|Full Auto}} Full Auto T2 changed to Imbues Bullets with +5 Spirit Damage (only affects {{AbilityIcon|Wraith}} Wraith)
- Fixed being able to melee and parry while stunned by {{AbilityIcon|Wraith}} Wraith's {{AbilityIcon|Telekinesis}} Telekinesis
- {{AbilityIcon|Flying Strike}} Flying Strike T3 now procs after the ability ends, rather than when connecting to the target

General.Description: - Games can now be watched by an unlimited number of spectators
- Spectator games now have 1 minute delay
- Added localization for Simplified Chinese, Russian, Brazilian Portuguese, Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Latin America), Turkish, Ukrainian, Czech, and French. These are currently a work-in-progress.
- Language can be selected from the settings menu
- Matchmaking windows are now open 1 hour earlier in all regions
- You can now prioritize your roster into three groups to indicate your preference ordering to the matchmaker: Selected, Priority, High Priority
- Added customization options for your crosshair
- Builds: You can now author a suggested ordering of Ability Upgrades
- Builds: You can now add per-item author comments by right clicking on items while editing builds that will show up in the item tooltip for users of the build
- Fixed a bug that allowed published build data to overwrite local changes to a published build
- Fixed a bug that prevented the last used hero build from loading when it was not a favorited build
- Hovering items in the shop will now highlight their components, or which item they are components of
- Reworked the Hero Stats UI in the shop
- Hero Stats in the shop have been expanded and are now broken up by Weapon, Vitality, and Spirit. Various additional stats that were previously hidden have been added here.
- Individual stats can now be hovered over to see a breakdown of all the bonuses contributing to a value, including things like golden statues
- Added descriptive gun information to each hero
- Added Spirit Power Impact panel that displays the effect of Spirit Power on your Abilities and Items
- Added Outgoing Damage as a UI display mode that you can toggle through
- Added a setting to let you customize the ability cancel hotkey (default is spacebar)
- Added a "Friends Only" checkbox to filter the watch tab
- Added an option to control zoom sensitivity
- Fixed Candle Troopers sometimes instantly disappearing on death rather than going into their death flash state
- Using an active item or ability removes the undo option for the item/AP
- Fixed some abuse cases with undoing AP cooldown reductions
- Added a video setting to reduce flashing effects
- Unpause hotkey is now displayed when the game is paused
- Pause cooldown per player increased from 10 minutes to 15 minutes
- Replaced the Urn drop parachute with new effects
- Fixed some cases where the comeback souls would be higher than intended in the early game
- Fixed being unable to ping while dead
- Improved smoothing of spectator camera position and angles
- Fixed a bug that allowed teleporters to be used while carrying the Soul Urn
- Fixed stuns resetting their duration if you were on the ground and became airborne
- Fixed ESC not working to close Settings popup sometimes
- Various visual adjustments on highlight and strobe effects being too loud in some cases
- Added popup to bot games to indicate that they tend to be much longer games than normal ones
- Added new Silence status effect sound
- Updated bullet whizby sounds for nearly all characters
- Fixed some spectator/replay sound and music bugs
- Various sound related performance improvements
- More impactful damage indication sound for attackers
- Improved lighting performance around shop
- Fixed Mimic options in sandbox not working properly
- Added alternate shop music

Misc Gameplay.Description: - Teleporter activation no longer gets canceled on incoming damage.
- Teleporter channel time increased from 4s to 5s
- Walkers now require you to be within 30m to deal damage to them
- Walker Health increased by 15%
- Base Guardian Health increased by 20%
- Patron damage increased by 30% after it is vulnerable
- Weakened Patron Health increased by 15%
- You can now use melee hotkey while zoomed to exit zoom and perform a melee
bounce_pad_locations.jpg
- Added one-way defender exits beside each outer lane entrance
- Added Speed Boost Volumes in the defender passages on the outsides of the base
base_speed_boost.jpg
- Firehouse (building next to Sapphire Yellow Guardian) has been reworked to match the layout of the Chapel
- Low roof buildings beside Amber Purple Guardian and Sapphire Yellow Guardian are now valid play spaces
- Removed zap triggers
- Added truck on the back side of those buildings to allow climbing up
- Removed rooftop props for those buildings
- Added billboards to the edge closest to the lane
- Low roof buildings between inner lane Walker arenas are now valid play spaces
- Removed zap triggers
- Expanded rooftop size
- Added fire escape stairs to allow access from the upper level from the Mid
rooftop_locations_large.jpg
- Walker Arena - Amber Yellow/Sapphire Purple:
- Added catwalks from high ground defender area to building across the street
- Added passage through building and stairs up to a peek spot toward the Guardian
- Replaced upper floor juke spot with a connection through building across from new peek spot
amber_yellow_walker_arena.jpg
- Walker Arena - Amber Orange/Sapphire Blue:
- Added catwalk from the low roof building to the building across the street
- Replaced juke spot in the courtyard with passage connecting to the new catwalk
- Widened hallway above Underground Shop
- Removed railing and added stairs in the passage toward the Guardian
- Courtyard floor opening to the Underground Shop moved closer to above the shop
amber_orange_walker_arena.jpg
- Walker Arena - Amber Blue/Sapphire Orange:
- Added a juke spot inside the Police Station/Garment Building
- Added a juke spot down the stairs from the Guardian to the left
amber_blue_walker_arena.jpg
- Walker Arena - Amber Purple/Sapphire Yellow:
- Added an interior corridor through the building between the base and the Walker
- Added a balcony that borders the arena on the back side of the Walker
amber_purple_walker_arena.jpg

Vitality Items.Description: - Majestic Leap: Health increased from +100 to +125
- Majestic Leap: Spirit Power increased from +8 to +10
- Soul Rebirth: Rebirth Health increased from 40% to 50%
- Soul Rebirth: Cooldown reduced from 240s to 200s

New Items.Description: - Added a new T1 Weapon item. Grants +35% Bullet Projectile Speed, +14% Weapon Damage and +50 Bullet Shield.
